effect.gold_silver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.
effect.crystal: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target. One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.

short_effect.gold_silver: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
short_effect.crystal: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

flavor_text.gold_silver: Fires three kinds of beams at once.
flavor_text.crystal: Fires three kinds of beams at once.
